title: Sushi Yama
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers many vegan sushi options. Tempura batter is vegan. Veggie roll options include sweet potato, avocado, kimchi, and cucumber. Some others are vegetable roll (asparagus, cucumber, avo, and lettuce pickle) and new vegetable roll (tempura fried asparagus, cucumber, avo, and pickled radish) and the peanut and avocado roll. Also has fruity rolls that contain cream cheese, like banana and mango.
